Exist alternative explanation: The claim may have an alternative explanation as the expert's verdict mentions that the data provided by the spokesperson for Bush's PAC was selectively chosen to put Florida in the most favorable light, suggesting that there may be other factors influencing the narrowing of the achievement gap in Florida.
Falters at times: The claim may falter at times as the expert's verdict mentions that by changing the date range, different results were found regarding the narrowing of the achievement gap in Florida. This suggests that the claim's assertion may not hold true consistently.
Understate: There is no indication of any bias of understating in the provided claim.
